item.title: Istio Security (securing microservices traffic with istio)
item.description: In this post I’m gonna talking about how to secure your micro-services in service mesh using istio. Prefer if the reader have a foundation knowledge of kubernetes but it’s not mandatory at all. So What is Istio ? Istio is a service mesh that allows organizations to connect, secure and observe microservices. Since its inception three years ago, it’s risen to become one of Google’s most prominent open source projects, a top-three keyword at KubeCon, and a mature, production-ready offering supported by a robust community.
